subject: A Smidge of Progress
event:
I decided to take a break from tearing and fumbling at the Meereenese knot, and completed a chapter about another character today.  A character who is very far from Meereen.

Finishing the chapter felt good.  Especially since it also completed that character's arc for the book.  Admittedly, she has only two chapters in DANCE, so I am not sending up any flares.  But hey, I'm done with one of them for the present, that's something.

Only thirty-eight more POVs to wrap up...

comments.article: Congratulations!!  Glad that you are coming to a few strong, fulfilling closures.  Truly looking forward to seeing this.
Really? 38? If only I could freeze myself like Cartman. But it could take years for ADWD to come out.
Keep at it! I am sure it will turn out well. I look forward to reading it.
Yay for another chapter down :)

comments.upictitle: i challenge you to fisticuffs: (animal) what I think of you
comments.article: Think of it as only 6.164414Â² more POVs to wrap up :)
i'm kindof a geek... but you just tookit a little too far
Yay! :)
Thirty-eight! How many POV chapters are typically in the books? I've never thought about it.
That's an exaggeration right?

Yes, that's an exaggeration. A number I pulled out of the air.

sigh

Some of you guys take every word I say much too literally. I suppose I need to start using those "I'm just kidding" icons when I'm kidding, but I'm afraid I am not of the icon generation.

I don't actually know how many POVs I have. More than I intended, definitely, but less than thirty-eight. Way less.

Guess I should go count 'em.
comments.subject: Re: 38?

comments.article: But thank you for keeping us informed. I anxiously await it's arrival to our bookshelves. I love your works!
comments.subject: Tease!

comments.article: Thirty-eight? Wow!  I assume that's chapters and not actual POVs?
That's neither.

Congratulations, George.

I can't wait to see the Meereenese knot's untying in print, and I have faith that I'll see it before the winter is out.
You can do it, sir! I'm sure the Dance is  worth the wait. Quality always is.

I am hoping by the time this is done you will come out and say "Well the good news is that I had done so much work around these chapters that I have already finished the next book as well", but I don't think we will be that lucky :(

One chapter at a time, one page at a time, one word at a time...easy to say, but must be torture for you when you are actually putting into practice. It is painful to wait but I really do appreciate you putting in this much effort to get the book exactly the way you want. You could have taken the easy way out many, many, many times by now and wrapped it up nice and neat, but then it wouldn't be an Ice and Fire book and it definitely would not be a GRRM book. I think everyone crying and complaining now will be blown away when this thing comes out.

Congrats!

BTW, how badly do you think the Giants are going to beat the Redskins? I'm calling 24-10.

I hope its Arya. Also, You keep up this amount of updates and you might just please ALL of your fans. (yes even those)
I for one am Happy you seem to be chipper about the books progress. Good luck with the knot.
Arya?! Bah, I hope Arya geta a lot more than that. I'd be happy if Sansa gets two POVs, and dies in one of them. :-)

Hey, some progress is better than no progress, right? Anyway, thanks for the update. You're too kind, appeasing us fanboys and fangirls.

Good luck the rest of the way!
comments.subject: Congrats

comments.article:
38 POV's? are you pulling our collective leg? all I have to say is damn...this is going to be one HELL of a book!
dance around the knot awhile.. then attack. you'll wear it down. (my swordplay analogy is a little trite, perhaps. alas.)
thanks for the update, this little fan says Rah Rah Rah :)
Stick the knot with the pointy end.
comments.subject: Swords

comments.upictitle: The Queen of Spades: Circus Performers
comments.article: This may be a stupid question, but is Dance intended to be the last book in the series?
I believe there are 2 more books intended to complete the series, but I'm sure the actual logistics will work themselves out in their own time.
That is fantastic!  Eat the elephant in small bites, right? :)

I created a livejournal account just to tell you how excited I am that you completed another chapter!  Even if you had seventy-seven more chapters to write I'm so happy your that much closer to completing DANCE.  Keep up the good work!!!  And thank you for being such a dedicated and original artist.  You have truly had a profound affect on my love of literature.  Your my favorite author (well maybe second compared to Alan Moore, but I still love you).
comments.subject: First time posting.

comments.article: I'm just wondering which of the ladies only gets 2 chapters in Dance, best guess i can come up with is either Brienne, if she lives that long, or Arya, but i kinda hope its neither.

comments.subject: ohh no, i had forgot about that

comments.upictitle: Jenna: Sugar and spice and all that
comments.article: yay!

38 POVs?!?!? Thinking back, I suppose that's not surprising but...good grief, no wonder it's taking so long. I don't think most I really grokked the scope of this series until you dropped that little factoid. *boggles for a bit.*

And, not that you necessarily need a random internet-monkey to tell you this, but it's a strong testament to your tremendous skill that each one of them is a recognizable, discrete individual who could be a story all by themselves.

Anyway, yay for progress! Very excited. And good luck, sir.
Happy progress! I'm thinking it was possibly Alayne or Brienne.  I'm glad it's coming together for you!
comments.subject: One word at a time.
